title: Did I break the Boards with my Summoner Name Change? :(
body:
RiotGradius thinks he broke the boards with his summoner name change. Everything keeps 404ing :(

http://i.imgur.com/AwHOAR9.jpg

replies.body:
Yeah yeah.. it broke so bad it removed all 10,000 RP from my league account.. oh noo! Guess you'll have to refund it. :(
[https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/130795/Trollface.png](https://openclipart.org/image/2400px/svg_to_png/130795/Trollface.png)
lol they should totally give you a refund i feel so bad 4u{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
It also took my Master title, pls help!
It took my Victorious Janna. Replacement please!
https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS9uW4bxzCEyfVKTMnSLcm21fTNZDSoQmlti6MRTaqKiLBbSSMF
https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS9uW4bxzCEyfVKTMnSLcm21fTNZDSoQmlti6MRTaqKiLBbSSMF
I dont understand what Im seeing , but I love it

> [{quoted}](name=esmelar,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-16T23:46:24.419+0000)
>
> I dont understand what Im seeing , but I love it

I changed my Summoner name from RiotGradius to 0x41 over the weekend to play without a Riot tag, just to see if the interactions with players changed at all. Nothing really changed, so I figured I wanted my old name back. Came to the boards to read threads and realized that everything on my account was 404'ing.

Lucky for me I have a request in to change my name back to my old summoner, but I didn't realize it'd change all my old posts to this name too. Guess it'll get fixed when I namechange back :)

Thanks for helping me test though! <3

Somewhat on topic...

Why 0x41    ?

> [{quoted}](name=Old Man Teeto,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=000100000004,timestamp=2016-03-17T18:43:47.350+0000)
>
> Somewhat on topic...
> 
> Why 0x41    ?

Mostly because the hex value 0x41 (capital "A" in ascii) is used a lot in security exploit testing as filler data. Often when you're playing with system memory, you want something that's easily identifiable when you're skimming through memory values, and 0x41 repeated is commonly used. 

tl;dr - I'm a security nerd, hah.

Ri0t Gradi0x41?


But serious question. When you were younger did you struggle with pointers or you got them instantly?

> [{quoted}](name=Samflash3,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=00010000000400000001,timestamp=2016-03-18T01:51:21.942+0000)
>
> Ri0t Gradi0x41?
> 
> 
> But serious question. When you were younger did you struggle with pointers or you got them instantly?

To this day I still have to flip a few switches and remove some brain-dust before I really get pointers and what they're doing. I mostly live in the cushy memory managed land of Python, and dive into C land when I'm working on things like exploits or low level function/memory stuff.

> [{quoted}](name=0x41,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=000100000004000000010000,timestamp=2016-03-18T16:21:28.178+0000)
>
> To this day I still have to flip a few switches and remove some brain-dust before I really get pointers and what they're doing. I mostly live in the cushy memory managed land of Python, and dive into C land when I'm working on things like exploits or low level function/memory stuff.

Mr./Ms. oX41, your job title sounds like the coolest thing ever, what exactly does it entail if you don't mind me asking?

Sincerely,
a Happy Poro

> [{quoted}](name=Happy Poro,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=0001000000040000000100000000,timestamp=2016-03-22T02:21:58.752+0000)
>
> Mr./Ms. oX41, your job title sounds like the coolest thing ever, what exactly does it entail if you don't mind me asking?
> 
> Sincerely,
> a Happy Poro

Lots of security related tasks, things like network firewalls, vulnerability and port scanning, building monitoring systems for all of these things, and automating everything so that as little as possible is done by hand. Pretty much if it's on Riot's network, I want to make sure it's secure as possible without slowing down Rioter's work days. I pretty much get to build things and break things related to network security.

(also, my name SHOULD be back to normal now)

nope, it is not.

Instead i see a name called "Loremipsumdolorsitamet..."

I'm shocked that hex codes aren't restricted out of potential summoner names. Just like no one should be able to name their child False. 

https://xkcd.com/327/

And on another note have you considered changing your name to ARIOTGRADIUS now?
I like it.....

> [{quoted}](name=0x41,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-16T23:48:41.525+0000)
>
> I changed my Summoner name from RiotGradius to 0x41 over the weekend to play without a Riot tag, just to see if the interactions with players changed at all. Nothing really changed, so I figured I wanted my old name back. Came to the boards to read threads and realized that everything on my account was 404'ing.
> 
> Lucky for me I have a request in to change my name back to my old summoner, but I didn't realize it'd change all my old posts to this name too. Guess it'll get fixed when I namechange back :)
> 
> Thanks for helping me test though! <3

I've only ever had 1 RIOT employee (that I know of) in a game with me.  Someone queue dodged.
I have one on my Friends list (Riot Arie), but she has yet to play a game with me D:
this is my 16th summoner name (nothing else to do with IP) and it does so every single time, i have to log everything of and refavorite boards etc with my new summoners name every time
No, but you do have quite the tryndamere streak....
Thanks for the explanation, I hope your problem gets fixed soon, My friend. Still weird image tho

''Associate information security engineer''

Can I get a long title like that too?

Careful. In my experience engineers are complete badasses.
http://static.zerochan.net/Isaac.Clarke.full.728761.jpg
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/p__/images/2/25/Gordon_Freeman.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150512214417&path-prefix=protagonist

You think you got what it takes to become a badass?
No TF2 Engie?  Son...I am VERY disappointed in you.  Go to the Dark Corner of Shameâ„¢ and think about what you did!
You can't tell me what to do! You're not me real mom!

Am engineer. Can confirm. 

Although I generally hit fewer monsters with crowbars and more obstinate pieces of machinery with rubber mallets, but still. Badass.

Sounds like a lot of work.
Back to the kitchen then.
I've never played Half Life, but Isaac is the one true engineer of this world (as far as I know)

Thank you everyone for the emotional support in such a tough time where I seem to be lacking my name.

> [{quoted}](name=f89da0s09an6987d,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EVAPuwYh,comment-id=000100000003,timestamp=2016-03-17T15:55:44.659+0000)
>
> I've only ever had 1 RIOT employee (that I know of) in a game with me.  Someone queue dodged.

Also, that's one of the reasons why I want to go back to using my Riot name in game. I enjoy being able to interact with players as a Rioter, even if I'm not as interesting as someone from the champ/balance/skin team. I remember when I ran into my first Rioter in the wild, it was like spotting the GM on WoW, super exciting.
It's almost a haiku. Find a word with two syllables to stick in that middle line.
"Senpai"
it's snowing on mt fuji
Yes we need a Rioter posting in memes&games! Join us Riot! Join us in the Upvote Wars and Gif Wars 2!
Oh god. I've seen that picture before, with the kid and the nonsensical quote, but I never realized that the added on face was Osama bin Laden.

Dem toasters!

http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view5/20140309/4996869/pink-toaster-violence-xd-o.gif
Look like me if my dad was Bin Laden and I had the same hair and forehead as when I was 10.
